channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024040152
item.description:
Report X-2024040152

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-11T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-03
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED AND RESPONDED IN FULL PPE WITH DECISION TREE. FOLLOWING PROPER RESPONSE SHEET SPILL WAS CLEANED UP AND BROUGHT TO DMP FOR DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024040055
item.description:
Report X-2024040055

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-05T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-28
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER REPORTED TO WORK AREA TO FIND A LEAKING HAZMAT IN THE DMP. RESPONDER DONNED PPE, (GOGGLES, GLOVES, BOOTS AND APRON) AND PREPARED TO RESPOND TO THE SPILL. FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS, CONTAINED THE SPILL AND DECONTAMINATED THE SPILL AREA. ALL WASTE WAS DISPOSED OF THROUGH THE DMP.
